homeHero.title: Connect Anonymously, Speak Freely
homeHero.body: Match with real people in seconds, stay in control with anonymous filters, and rely on built-in guardrails that keep every conversation safe.

panel.title: Why people choose Fellowus
panel.item1: Anonymous IDs and intent filters keep matches relevant.
panel.item2: Guided safety flows and quick report tools protect every chat.
panel.item3: Instant language & theme toggles make the interface inclusive.
